Fame, wealth, and power shall be mine so: With my troops, the Blue King won't know what's coming to him!
Hey who's chubby...short? And yellow hair is that!
Heh. You and I both have something in common.
I think we can work something out! What do you say?
Well if it isn't a runt for the Blue King!
Don't you know who I am?
Are you Tom, Jeff, or Jerry? You barbarians all look the same.
Do you find me for a fool!
Guards call Tom, Jeff, and Jerry take this imbecile away
I could never dare to be seen serving a coward!
We have quite the bratty snot.
Farewell... Guards feed this fool to the Pekka's playhouse.
At least there he could be of some use!
However, I have sneaking suspicion of who you say you really are...
Actually I have an idea. Let's play a game...
To see if you really are who you say you are!
You must know I hate rubbish...
Therefore, you will duel against the giant!
I am satisfied with you! Jerry, Jeff or whatever...
Well now, child. I have a mission specifically for you!
Pathetic. You could not finish the trial in time.
Return when you have some real strength.
What could you possibly share in common with me?
You serve that lowly snot for crying out loud!
You jest! I stopped caring about that rubbish king for a long time now!
I can't stand that mohawk man and his hog.
Ever since they became a team...
My glory as the barbarian has been cast aside!
However, you must do as I say to ensure success!
Save it for later. We don't have all day here!
Get going or do you want me to repeat myself?!
Oh that's your brother! What's up with being a downer?
It's been a rough day. Grab me a barrel of elixir.
Just because the King favours you more now, doesn't mean you're all of that!
Hey, hey! I am sorry that I am helping our King win for once…
We were doing just fine without you!
Hmmm. Remind me of the last time we won without me and my hog?
I've had enough of you! How much for the pork!
Ugh. Cut it out the two of you! You guys are such a drag.
Well it's the game for ultimate champion~
How could you not be excited?
Maybe its exciting for you because you actually get to play
We troops are just spectators at this point for the king!
Hey, the King just sees potential in me that's all!
Oh yea? Who would have guessed...
If it weren't for you...We would still be on our king's deck!
And if it weren't for me, my hog would have been roast!
You would still be stuck here cleaning from our scraps if it weren't for you and that ugly pig!
Don't you dare speak about my precious hog like that!
Boo hoo! What are you going to do?
Your highness isn't here to save you!
How dare you speak about the king like that!
That's it! You are not welcomed into my tavern anymore!
Good! Your elixir taste like crap anyways!
Good grief! That barbarian truly lives up to his name!
Don't you love the warmth of the sun?
The fresh smell of the sea!
This has got to be a dream!
My precious sweet pie could never be used for bacon!
Do you like it medium rare or well-done?
I normally don't eat it rare...
But given this is a job well-done, I'm all for it!
But I should really get ready for the battle!
That's what I like to hear!
Where did my cute, pink, precious squishy melon go?
I need to find my piggy!
Hey do you know where he is?
Well, see you later at the arena!
I know you like to play games and all but today we don't have time for that!
There's fresh carrot for you downstairs!
That's strange, I'm sure he would fall for that.
We are live from TV Storyboard.
Let's hear word from our reporter, Jess at the Arena
Who is excited for today's match?
After yesterdays upsetting match 3-2 for Red, things look dicey!
As long as the Hog Rider pulls his act together...
Blue appears like the clear victor!
I certainly can hear plenty of cheering out there.
With one more hour left on the clock...
Get your popcorn, or head towards the tavern for elixir because...
This is a battle you cannot miss!
Oh no! This is a disaster!
I need to find that piggy quick.
My king and my team needs be down at the arena!
You guys think this is a good idea?
It's not like we are going to cook the pig alive!
Come on are you really going to chicken out last minute!
Simple, we will sneak into his house...
And then slice his pig into pork chop!
But if we did, you wouldn't mind right?
Cmon I know you are that much of a weakling...
Are you really going to betray us...
Even after our king specifically gave you a mission?
We have never had that honour!
You came to the king seeking the very power the hog rider has stolen from you
And now you can take it back!
Or are you still the same old coward I thought you were...
But do you promise the king will make me like him?!
But that man and his hog make one heck of a partner
If we want to stand a chance against the Red King...!
We, the weak will never be important if we are merely stepping stools!
This is not betrayal, this is justice!
Justice against the atrocities committed by the Hog Rider!
Are you too much of coward to leave a blind eye to this?!
You still seem a little hesitant!
Ok then, grab his pig and do it!
So who's going to do it?
Make sure nobody tries anything funny!
Ah ha, there you are buddy!
Your a lot bigger in person, wow!
The king asked me to come get you!
Let's see how heavy you are
Relax, it's not like I'm kidnapping you or anything!
Ok fine, let's play a game.
If you lose, you have to do what I say.
Heh. But this game won't be favourable for you buddy...
I had one in my pocket all along!
Bring the hog to the goblins
Now, your work has been done...
The king sees no further use in you!
What are you going to do?
Fight all of us at once?
I just need to buy some time...
Now be a good boy and stay here ok?
It was close, but I got the corn!
It's a tie, so I win!
